item.title: BERLO
item.description:
BERLO

,

Established 2003

,

BERLO is a design consultancy and crossdomain practice dedicated to create Land and Building Inheritance Value, using artistic and architectural means and processes. Our master believe is that great projects have strong aesthetic, functional and cultural ideas clad onto a core vision, engaged by both the client and maker, and able to create life and prosperity to the inhabitants and the surrounding community. With each project we push for simplicity and harmony, all with respect for environment and site value, and like establishing relationships that can build and develop future grounds.
